name: @midnight-ntwrk/midnight-js-testing
description: Testing utilities and e2e tests for MidnightJS
author: IOHK

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist reports coverage logs tsconfig.build.tsbuildinfo .rollup.cache managed midnight-level-db
scripts.build: yarn compact && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs && yarn compact-copy
scripts.it: docker compose -f compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config config/vitest.package.it.config.ts run
scripts.e2e: docker compose -f compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config config/vitest.e2e.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-debug: docker compose -f compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:containers' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config config/vitest.e2e.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-testnet: MN_TEST_ENVIRONMENT=testnet-02 DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config config/vitest.e2e.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-groups: docker compose -f compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:containers' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config config/vitest.groups.config.ts run
scripts.compact: yarn fetch-compactc && yarn compact-counter && yarn compact-simple && yarn compact-counter-clone && yarn compact-unshielded
